U

Upload - class com.ecs.utils.uploader.Upload.
Upload by default stores a file list in the local Stellent content server passing in all the attributes name/value pairs as metadata for each file.
Upload() - Constructor for class com.ecs.utils.uploader.Upload
 
unmarshal(ByteArrayOutputStream, Class, Mapping) - Static method in class com.ecs.utils.CastorXMLUtils
Unmarshals the output stream and attempts to return a Java object of the type specifed by the className parameter.
update() - Method in class com.ecs.utils.stellent.LWDocument
Calls the UPDATE_DOCINFO service on this document.
updateDocument() - Method in class com.ecs.utils.DocUtils
Special content item update function.
useDatabase() - Method in class com.ecs.utils.stellent.LWDocument
Call this function to force the wrapped content item to instantiate against the database metadata view rather than the search index.
userHasRole(String) - Method in class com.ecs.utils.stellent.embedded.FWUser
